amendment.description: To prohibit the imposition and collection of tolls on certain highways constructed using Federal funds in Texas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2825 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2825 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S11404-11405) To prohibit the imposition and collection of tolls on certain highways constructed using Federal funds in Texas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2825 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2825 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Hutchison.
